WorkItem.Description: This would be helpful with those that have hybrid or heavy balance specs to see the viability of being forced to heal as balance.  Certain balance talents would need added to allow it.

Comments.Message:
A tree can't even cast Healing Touch... I guess I could add it though.
Nature's Grace would be annoying to model (especially if you want to model keeping a lifebloom stack refreshed). The big problem is that the tree module is built around rotating HoTs, in a tight schedule. With that talent, you change your rotations based on when you crit (probably a regrowth).
Moonglow, Lunar Guidance and Dreamstate, I could add (along with Heart of the Wild, Survival of the Fittest and Nurturing Instinct, so we can have a crit chicken vs. kitty heal competition).

But I can tell you right now that moonkin/resto hybrid is viable (just not in high-end raids). I've healed Magtheridon in full feral spec (with Intensity) and topped the healing meter.

Ok, all the relevant talents have been added to the dev version of Rawr. Even when I picked all HT talents, idol and 4-set T6 (with no talents for rejuv/regrowth), the solver recommends never using HT over other spells. This is because the value of the HoT-part of regrowth is 100% of the max value, making regrowth still more mana-efficient and heal/second efficient.
So you would pretty have to give the solver no option but to use HT if you want to cast it.

And just to give numbers on the viability of specs (with my gear)...
Full feral: 2150 HPS
Full moonkin: 2200 HPS
Moonglow: 2400 HPS
Dreamstate (HT talents, no imp rejuv): 2400 HPS
Dreamstate (no HT talents): 2500 HPS
Resto: 3050 HPS
Also, Healing touch may or may not be added for tree in WotLK, I believe recent reports from beta are that it can be.
